!An occupational change is when one with certain abilities and experience gets promoted to a higher-level occupation. If you are an Shaman you can change occupations to an *Overlord* or a *Warcryer*. Which occupation do you want to learn about? [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30513/10.htm|Overlord] [npc_%objectId%_Link villagemaster/30513/13.htm|Warcryer]Â
